params.token: ERC20 token address used for payout

addBounty(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Configure bounty token/amount for a request (mutable until winner approval)

approvedWinner(uint256).notice: Pre-approved winner for a request (set by moderators/governance)

communityRegistry().notice: Community registry for access control and community data

completeEngagement(uint256,bytes).notice: Complete a one-shot engagement: payout bounty and mint WORK engagement SBT atomically

getCommunityRequests(uint256).notice: Get all requests for a community

getRequestComments(uint256).notice: Get all comments for a request

getRequestsByTag(uint256,string).notice: Get requests by tag (view helper - off-chain filtering recommended for gas efficiency)

linkValuableAction(uint256,uint256).notice: Link request to a ValuableAction for work verification

postComment(uint256,uint256,string).notice: Post a comment on a request

setApprovedWinner(uint256,address).notice: Approve a winner for a one-shot engagement (non-clearable)

userLastPostTime(uint256,address).notice: User last post time for rate limiting: communityId => user => timestamp

userRequestCount(uint256,address).notice: User request count for rate limiting: communityId => user => count

valuableActionRegistry().notice: ValuableActionRegistry for engagement issuance and policy lookup
